title.narrative: Technical Assistance to the process of implementing industrial platforms in the different poles targeted by the PDPC in the province of Bas-Congo

description.narrative: This project will provide technical assistance in the overall management of the growth pole programme (PDPC) which aims at strengthening the relevant agro-sectors. More precisely, the project will contribute to the establishment of multiservice platform, considered both as a center of technical and commercial development, allowing farmers and entrepreneurs / processors access to infrastructure, services and technologies to develop their skills, enhance their products and thereby increase their income and generating jobs. To do so, the project will established a national coordination team based in Kinshasa which will work in close collaboration with the national coordination team of the PDPC in providing specific technical advisory services which has been delineated in terms of reference received on 27 August 2014. The technical advisory service will be sought through UNIDO expertise for the different tasks to be carried out. The overall objective of the project is to contribute to increasing productivity and employment opportunities in the province of Bas-Congo via the provision of a technical assistance to the PDPC. The specific objective of the project is to contribute to improving the revenue level of rural populations through technical support to capacity-building activities in target poles by the PDPC.
